啌啌啌

啌字的基本解释

啌
qiāng
咳：啌嗽。
怒叱声。

啌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiāng］
［《集韻》枯江切，平江，溪。］
(1)同“嗆”。水或食物进入气管引起咳嗽。
(2)见“啌嗽”。
[②]［kōng］
见“啌2啌”、“啌2嚨”。

啌字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　啌； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页195第06
【廣韻】許江切【集韻】虛江切，?音肛。【玉篇】咄也。　又【廣韻】啌瞋，語出《聲譜》。　又【集韻】嗽也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?枯江切，音腔。本作㾤。喉㾰也。

啌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
啌字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Silly
qiāng
Cough: Coughing.
Rage.
Silly
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiāng］
["Jiyun" Kujiang cut, Pingjiang, Xi. ]
(1) Same as "choking". Water or food enters the windpipe and causes a cough.
(2) See "Coughing".
[②]［kōng］
See "啌2啌", "啌2啌".
Silly
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　啌; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 195 06
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiangqie [Jiyun] Xu Jiangqie, sound anus. [Jade articles] Duh also.　[Guangyun] sullenly, and said "Sound Spectrum".　[Jiyun] Cough again.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Kujiang cut, tune. This made 㾤. Throat 㾰 also.
